mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member ( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONENUMBER, MEMBER_EMAIL ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhoneNumber}, #{memberEmail} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_PASSWORD, m.MEMBER_ENABLED, a.AUTHORITIES_AUTHORITY FROM member m LEFT JOIN authorities a ON m.MEMBER_ID = a.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' ORDER BY MEMBER_CREATE DESC
